amendment.description: Amendment sought to limit 50% of the funding for the W76-2 warhead modification program until the Secretary of Defense submits a report assessing the program's impacts on strategic stability and options to reduce the risk of miscalculation.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 115-698 to limit 50% of the funding for the W76-2 warhead modification program until the Secretary of Defense submits a report assessing the program's impacts on strategic stability and options to reduce the risk of miscalculation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garamendi amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 188 - 226 (Roll no. 222).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Garamendi.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Garamendi amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 188 - 226 (Roll no. 222).
